citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), National Marine Mammal Laboratory (NMML)
citeinfo.title: Northern Fur Seals - Pribilof Islands, Alaska

descript.abstract:
Marine Mammals - Northern Fur Seal population data
Northern fur seals: Estimated numbers of pups born and counts of adult males (three categories: adult males without territories or females, adult males with territories but without females, and adult males with territories containing females) on the Pribilof Islands. Data are available for both islands (St. Paul and St. George).
NMML annual reports on fur seal investigations are available from NMML library.
Variable for pup estimates (no data from 1925-1939, 1941-1948); nearly continuous and annual for adult males.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
